ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader

Class NetworkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.NetworkController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppObservable, AppObserver, NetworkerListener

    public class NetworkController
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppObserver, NetworkerListener, AppObservable
    Talks to the elastic search user. Supports adding, loading, and updating users. Stole a lot of code from ESDemo Created by jjohnsto on 11/26/15.

        Returns:
        an array list of Users.

      • searchByUserName

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> searchByUserName(java.lang.String str)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method Searches the elastic search for the given username.
        Parameters:
        str - the username string to search for
        Returns:
        an array list of Users that matched the search query.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Uploads user data to the elastic search server. If the user has already been added, their data will be updated
        Parameters:
        user - is the user we want to upload. This will always be the phone's user, accessed through the singleton
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException
        java.io.IOException

      • loadUser

        public User loadUser(java.lang.String id)
        Fetches a user from the server. This is necessary for getting information (user profile, inventory) about any other user using our app. Necessary when adding friends, and browsing their profile/inventory.
        Parameters:
        id - is the android device id used to index users in the elastic search server.
        Returns:
        a User object filled with the relevent profile/inventory data.

      • postTrade

        public java.lang.Boolean postTrade(Trade trade)
        This method converts the trade into json and then uploads it to the elastic search server.
        Parameters:
        trade -

      • getMyTrades

        public java.util.ArrayList<Trade> getMyTrades(java.lang.String id)
        This method retrieves all trades for the given user's android id. The user is involved in the trade if they are borrower or owner of the trade.
        Parameters:
        id - the device user's android id.
        Returns:
        the array list of all the trades that the given user is involved in.

      • deleteGeneric

        public void deleteGeneric(java.lang.String removeUrl)
        This method removes a given url from the elastic search server. Code taken from the ES Demo project.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • postImages

        public java.lang.Boolean postImages(java.lang.String imageId,
                           java.lang.String json)
        This method wraps the base64 encoded image into a class that stores the encoding and the imageID. That class gets converted into json and uploaded to the elastic search server.
        Parameters:
        imageId - the image ID of the image.
        json - the base64 string representation of the image.
        Returns:
        whether this method was successful or not.

      • getImages

        public ImagePackage getImages(java.lang.String imageId,
                     Context context)
        This method, given image ID will fetch and download that given image onto the user's device. The base64 encoded image will be taken out of the class and saved as a file whoese filename is the image ID.
        Parameters:
        imageId -
        context -
        Returns:

      • appNotify

        public void appNotify(AppObservable observable)
        NetworkController observers the User. Whenever the user edits their profile/inventory/games, we want to send the updated data to the server.
        Specified by:
        appNotify in interface AppObserver
        Parameters:
        observable - contains the object that is being observed by this class.

      • netListenerNotify

        public void netListenerNotify(int commandRequest)
        Used by Networker classes (like TradeNetworker, and PictureNetworker). They can call this method to launch this class' methods in a different thread.
        Specified by:
        netListenerNotify in interface NetworkerListener
        Parameters:
        commandRequest -

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(AppObserver observer)
        Adds the ability to be able to add observers who observe the class.
        Specified by:
        addObserver in interface AppObservable
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to be added which wants to be notified on the update.

      • deleteObserver

        public void deleteObserver(AppObserver observer)
        The ability to remove an observer from the watch list, thus that observer will not be observing this class anymore.
        Specified by:
        deleteObserver in interface AppObservable
        Parameters:
        observer - This observer will be removed.
